definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Pop dot long T collocation tooling tall waist trousers, small lovely overflow.
sentences.chinese: 波普圆点长T搭配工装高腰裤，小可爱洋溢。

sentences.english: ET: Plus, you have a cute little bathtub scene that's kind of racy.
sentences.chinese: 加上，你有点小可爱的浴盆的场面有些越级。
再见吧，米雪，我的小可爱。

sentences.english: Under her small lovely nose, there is a little naughty mouth.
sentences.chinese: 在她小可爱的鼻子下面，有一个小淘气的嘴巴。

sentences.english: But you haven't tasted my gumbo. How you doing, cutie ?
sentences.chinese: 但是你还没有尝过我做的秋葵汤你好吗小可爱？

sentences.english: I think she is a cutie.
sentences.chinese: 我觉患上她是个小可爱。

definition: sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
(neologism) (coll.) pet owner (lit. "official in charge of cleaning up poop")
(Internet slang) to form a hand heart using one's thumb and forefinger (or by using both hands)
